page.title: 14EARDISLEY VILLAGE CHILDREN
page.content: I live in the centre of Eardisley.When I have had my breakfast I feed my budgie,it is green and yellow. Sometimes I go round the corner to the shops,my Mum has a hairdressers shop.Sometimes I help her in the shop. I like to play with my friends in the Avenue.I play on my roller boots or on my bike.Then I go home to watch T.V. or go to bed. My Mum and Dad keep a General Store in Eardisley.I have to stock up the dog food.I also have to make a list for my Dad to go to the warehouse.I let out the poultry from the tin shed into the run.I have to feed my rabbits twice a day.By the time I have done that and had my breakfast it is time for school .After school I take my dog for a walk.On Sundays I go for a bike ride with my Dad.I go train spotting when I go to my Aunties but not very often.
